item.title: Baxter add a quote by Hunter S. Thompson
item.description: "No sympathy for the devil; keep that in mind. Buy the ticket, take the ride...and if it occasionally gets a little heavier than what you had in mind, well...maybe chalk it off to forced conscious expansion: Tune in, freak out, get beaten." -- Hunter S. Thompson

item.title: Baxter add a quote by Hunter S. Thompson
item.description: "I hate to advocate drugs, alcohol, violence, or insanity to anyone, but they've always worked for me." -- Hunter S. Thompson

item.title: Baxter add a quote by F. Scott Fitzgerald
item.description: "So we beat on, boats against the current, borne back ceaselessly into the past." -- F. Scott Fitzgerald

item.title: Baxter add a quote by Hunter S. Thompson
item.description: "THE EDGE, there is no honest way to explain it because the only people who really know where it is are the ones who have gone over." -- Hunter S. Thompson

item.title: Baxter add a quote by Hunter S. Thompson
item.description: "We can't stop here, this is bat country!" -- Hunter S. Thompson

item.title: Baxter add a quote by Hunter S. Thompson
item.description: "A word to the wise is infuriating. " -- Hunter S. Thompson

item.title: Baxter add a quote by Hunter S. Thompson
item.description: "The highways are crowded with people who drive as if their sole purpose in getting behind the wheel is to avenge every wrong done them by man, beast or fate. The only thing that keeps them in line is their fear of death, jail and lawsuits." -- Hunter S. Thompson
